DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to compare the sedation profile one hour after dose administration between Seroquel IR and Seroquel XR.
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing the Tolerability of Seroquel IR With Seroquel XR in Patients With Bipolar Depression
DOC.criteria: DSMIVTR documented bipolar I or bipolar II, most recent episode depressed Outpatient status as enrollment Other than bipolar disorder under study, patients must not have another current, major disorder that is symptomatic or has required treatment within 6 months of enrollment.
